item.title: My mother, 81, discovered her ‘millions’ in investments are gone. What can I do?
$53 billion mega-merger with Teck transforms Anglo American from prey to predator
item.description: The deal could be viewed as a compelling value opportunity for Anglo, or an attempt to discourage further aggressors like BHP.

item.title: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?
item.description: “We want to invest the money and play catch up with our retirement savings/funding.”

item.title: Novartis to buy U.S. biotech in latest deal targeting firms in $1 billion to $3 billion range
item.description: Novartis on Tuesday said it was buying a U.S. biotech working on a cardiovascular drug, continuing what’s been a flurry of acquisitions at a similar p...

item.title: ‘He is increasingly angry’: My troubled son lives with me. How do I ensure he is financially secure after I die?
item.description: “Our family does have a long history of interventions, including hospitalizations.”
